topic.title: Speed Dial
topic.shortdesc: Speed dial feature allows you to place a call by pressing a reduced number of keys.

body.p: There are 16 configurable speed dial templates available on TA1600/2400/3200.

ul.li: Speed Dial Code: The speed dialing number.

li.p: Phone Number: The number you want to call.

body.example: To call 18033334444, you can simply dial *981. The *98 tells TA1600/2400/3200 that you want to use the speed dial and the 1 is the speed dial code for destination number 18033334444.
body.note: Do not forget to add the dial pattern according to the selected dial pattern template. The destination number should match the FXS port dial pattern.
